lines.text: The more haste the less speed.
He stole that ticket out of your pocket. I despise him, Dad. The lazy, good-for-nothing, fat, overfed monkey!
He, uh, he isn't too fat.

[after throwing Wolfinger to free himself from a wrestling hold]
Did I hurt yuh?
How could you hurt anybody throwing them on their head?
But this is the first one I killed in all my life!
Oh, that's in your favor, yeah.
They have no more case against you than a sheep has against a butcher.
Sweetheart, I take an oath on your poor mother's grave. I never saw the wrestling matches this afternoon. Things happened!
My poor mother-in-law died three days ago. I'm attending her funeral this afternoon.
Yes, it's terrible. It's awful. Horrible tragedy.
It must be hard to lose your mother-in-law.
Yes it is, very hard. It's almost impossible.
